page.title: 17FOOD AND DRINK
page.content: Nearly every week a new food product comes out onto the market. Many of them are basic things that are jazzed up. There are lots of exciting things to choose from. Different kinds of{chips,}e.g.{alphabites, potato {waffles, oven chips and normal chips. There are millions of{canned foods and {frozen foods.}The biggest selling food out today is{chocolate.}The three main companies are{Cadburys, Rowntrees and {Mars.}This year the newest chocolate is a{Wispa.}The drinks are a wide variety as well.There is{coke, lilt, {squirt, corona, panda pops. Coke bought out a new flavour but it has not gained universal popularity so the old flavour is back as an alternative. The cans are usually 25p but the{panda {pops}are only 12p. Some of the popular chocolate bars are{Mars Bar, Toffee {Crisp, Aero, Topic and Milky Way.
